short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of websites disallowing <body> scrolling? Click on a button of this extension and website will scroll again.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tired of websites disallowing <body> scrolling because you have AdBlock or you HAVE TO agree with cookies? Click on a button of this extension and website will scroll again. Simple as that. So you can block all the annoying popups freely!
